Posts.Content: Apr 24, 2017 09:59AM thomj wrote: Breast Cancer is awful. My wife had breast cancer 8 years ago. Double mastectomy, chemo, and radiation. After 8 years at her 6 months scan, cancer back with vengeance. It's in her brain, spine, and hip. She's only 42 and her biggest worry is about kids age 10 and 15. Already started radiation and chemo. Prayers needed To
Posts.Title: I'm new.... Tennessee msphil
